content.xhtml:p: This example test that, despite of 2T period clock stimulating TRIG pin of pyth_eval blocks, blocks keep executing one after the other, in respect of execution order.
You will be ready to use beremiz with C and Python when you will understand why "FromInput" is equal to 75. Enjoy.
Sleep here is bad. It blocks other py_eval instances. Whith a wxGlade GUI, GUI freeze for a second.
Prints FBID to stdout of PLC runtime. FBID is a unique reference to py_eval instance.
Simple_C_Call is declared in C_File "1.x:c_code". See python ctypes manual for details on typing.
Fast clock, at least faster that sleep(1). See what happens when python takes time to answer : PLC continues.
